npm.name: Node.js/JavaScript
npm.specific_capabilities:
- **Package Analysis**: Understand dependencies and vulnerabilities
- **Test Framework Integration**: Works with Jest, Mocha, Vitest
- **Bundle Optimization**: Identify unused code and optimization opportunities
- **API Documentation**: Generate comprehensive API docs from code
commands: # Test your npm project with AI assistance

cargo.name: Rust
cargo.specific_capabilities:
- **Memory Safety Analysis**: Advanced ownership and borrowing insights
- **Performance Profiling**: Identify bottlenecks and optimization opportunities
- **Crate Ecosystem**: Navigate and understand Rust crate dependencies
- **Unsafe Code Review**: Special focus on unsafe block analysis

python.name: Python
python.specific_capabilities:
- **Type Hint Analysis**: Improve type safety and documentation
- **Virtual Environment Management**: Optimize dependency isolation
- **Performance Profiling**: Identify slow functions and memory usage
- **Data Science Integration**: Special support for pandas, numpy workflows
commands: # Generate Python tests with pytest integration
# Analyze Python code patterns and imports

go.name: Go
go.specific_capabilities:
- **Concurrency Analysis**: Goroutine and channel pattern insights
- **Module Management**: Understand go.mod dependencies and versions
- **Performance Benchmarking**: Generate and analyze Go benchmarks
- **Interface Design**: Analyze interface usage and design patterns

java.name: Java
java.specific_capabilities:
- **Maven/Gradle Integration**: Understand build configuration and dependencies
- **JVM Analysis**: Memory usage and garbage collection insights
- **Spring Framework**: Special support for Spring Boot applications
- **Design Pattern Recognition**: Identify and suggest enterprise patterns

csharp.name: C#/.NET
csharp.specific_capabilities:
- **.NET Framework Analysis**: Understand framework versions and compatibility
- **NuGet Package Management**: Analyze package dependencies and conflicts
- **LINQ Optimization**: Improve query performance and readability
- **Async/Await Patterns**: Analyze and optimize asynchronous code

generic.name: Generic Project
generic.specific_capabilities:
- **Universal Code Analysis**: Language-agnostic code insights
- **Documentation Generation**: Create comprehensive project documentation
- **Architecture Analysis**: Understand project structure and dependencies
- **Best Practices**: Apply general software engineering principles
commands: # Research best practices for your domain
